data.title: Database Finder
data.text:
ACS Publications

Online Journals from the American Chemical Society. Includes over 55 peer-reviewed journals and magazines. With the ACS Journal Archives, searchable access is provided to 3 million pages pages of original chemistry dating back to 1879. Also includes access to the ACS Style Guide, 3rd edition. Located under ACS eBooks.

AIP Journals

AIP Publishing publishes its conference proceedings and journals here along with the content of AIP Member Societies (AVS - American Vacuum Society). RIT subscribes to AIP Complete. The only title excluded is Journal of Rheology.

American Physical Society Journals

The American Physical Society's Journal package that includes access to all journal content that APS publishes including the Physical Review Online Archive (PROLA) back to 1893. Includes such titles as: Physical Review Letters, Physical Review Series and Review of Modern Physics.

Annual Reviews

Critical reviews written by leading scientists in Biomedical, Physical, and Social Sciences.

BioMed Central

Free access to peer-reviewed biological/medical research articles

BioOne

Articles in the biological, ecological and environmental sciences.

BuildingGreen

Provides comprehensive content on sustainable design practices and green building materials. Shares expertise and lessons learned from design experts working in the field. Builds context for sustainable design strategies and what makes a building product or material green. Research materials on green materials and sustainable design, including case studies and best green practices.

CAS SciFinder

CAS SciFinder is the latest scientific information solution from CAS, a division of the American Chemical Society. In addition to reference, substance, reaction and supplier content, CAS SciFinder® includes relevance-ranked results, step-by-step procedures and protocols, citation mapping, biosequence searching, retrosynthetic analysis, patent landscape mapping, touch-screen enabled structure drawing and much more—all accessible in a simple, easy-to-use interface.

Cochrane Library

Source of reliable , current information (not full text) on the effects of interventions in health care.

CQ Researcher Online

Reporting & analysis of political & social issues, with topics in health, international affairs, education, the environment, technology & the U.S. economy.

Gale OneFile: Health and Medicine

This multi-source database provides access to the full text of nursing and allied health journals, plus the wide variety of personal health information sources in InfoTrac's award-winning Health Reference Center plus 40 full-text nursing and allied health journals.

GreenFILE

Identifies scholarly and general interest articles, books, and government reports on the effects humans have on the environment.

Health Source: Nursing/Academic Edition

Articles and abstracts from medical, allied health & nursing scholarly journals.

Healthcare Administration Database

Covers health administration, including public health and safety, hospitals, finance, personnel management, insurance, population studies, labor relations and law.

IOPScience

Full text of the publications of the Institute of Physics. As of 2020, it also includes the titles from the Electrochemical Society (ECS) Library: Journal of The Electrochemical Society, ECS Journal of Solid State Science and Technology, ECS Transactions and the archives of ECS Electrochemistry Letters, ECS Solid State Letters, and Electrochemical and Solid State Letters.

JAMA Network

Searches the American Medical Association journals: JAMA, and the archives of the journals Dermatology, Facial Plastic Surgery, Family Medicine, General Psychiatry, Internal Medicine, Neurology, Ophthalmology, Otolaryngology - Head & Neck Surgery, Pediatrics & Adolescent Medicine, and Surgery.

JSTOR

Features full-text articles (backfiles) of more than 2,800 academic journals across the humanities, social sciences, and sciences. Provides access to more than 75,000 ebooks. JSTOR also features multimedia content and includes Artstor, a cross-disciplinary collection of over 2 million images for use in research and teaching.

MathSciNet

MathSciNet is an electronic publication offering access to a carefully maintained and easily searchable database of reviews, abstracts and bibliographic information for much of the mathematical sciences literature.

MEDLINE - EBSCO

Identifies articles in medicine, nursing, dentistry, veterinary medicine, the health care system, pre-clinical sciences.

NASA Technical Reports Server (NTRS)

Indexes technical reports, contractor reports, NASA-authored dissertations and reprints on the web in aerospace research.

Nature Journals Online

Full-text of several Nature research and review journals

Optics InfoBase

Full text of Optica Publishing Group journals from Optica. Optica is formerly known as the Optical Society of America.

PubMed

A service of the U.S. National Library of Medicine that includes over 16 million citations from MEDLINE and other life science journals for biomedical articles back to the 1950s.

Royal Society of Chemistry Journals (RSC)

Contains full-text of chemistry journals.

ScienceDirect

ScienceDirect contains over 25% of the world's science, technology and medicine full text and bibliographic information.
